title: JSON schema for the abi-toolkit config file

inputDirOrPath.description: The input directory or file path for ABIs.

typingsOutputDir.description: The output directory for generated typings.

library.description: The library to use (e.g., ethers_v4, ethers_v5, ethers_v6, web3).

libraryImportAlias.description: Override the library import from name. Eg. 'from "ethers"' to 'from "ethersv5"'

framework.description: Framework to use. Eg. 'hardhat' or 'truffle'. Defaults to 'none'.

makeOutputDir.description: Whether to create the output directory if it doesn't exist.

makeIndexFile.description: Whether to generate an index file exporting all the generated typings. Defaults to true.

typingsOutputFileName.description: The file name to use for the generated typings. Only used for single file input. Defaults to name of the ABI file.

typingsOutputFileSuffix.describe: The suffix to append to the file name of the generated typings. eg. (my-abi.types.ts vs my-abi.ts). Defaults to `types`

typingsPrefixTypes.description: Whether to prefix the name of the type with the `typingsOutputFileName`, eg. ('MyTokenContract' or 'PrefixNameContract') vs 'Contract'. Defaults to false.

verbatimModuleSyntax.description: Whether to use verbatim module syntax.

language.description: The language to generate. Defaults to 'ts'.

eslintOptions.description: The ESLint configuration object or the path to the eslintrc file.

prettierOptions.description: The Prettier configuration object or the path to the prettierrc file.

classOutputDir.description: The output directory for the class files. Defaults to the `typingsOutputDir` if not supplied.

classOutputFileName.description: The file name to use for the generated class. Only used for single file input. Defaults to name of the ABI file.

classOutputFileSuffix.description: The suffix to append to the file name of the generated classes. eg. (my-abi.contract.ts vs my-abi.ts). Defaults to `contract`.

classMulticall.description: Enable multicall support in generated classes.
